text: Horsin' Around is the sixth album and final album by Carrie Lucas. Released in 1984 on the Constellation label. ==Track listing== #"Summer In The Street" #"Charlie" #"Goin' In Circles" #"Horsin' Around" #"Hello Stranger" #"Let's Keep Dancing" #"Somebody Said" #"Superstar" ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !
